meanings.definition: The art or technique of movie photography, including both the shooting and the processing of a motion picture.
meanings.sent1: The cinematography in the film captured the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The cinematography of the movie was praised for its stunning visuals.
meanings.sent3: The cinematography made the characters look like they were in a magical world.
meanings.sent4: Her photographs had a cinematography that brought out the emotions in each scene.
meanings.sent5: The cinematography painted a vivid picture of the story through visual storytelling.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of making motion pictures.
meanings.sent1: Learning about cinematography involves understanding how to create films.
meanings.sent2: Good cinematography can enhance the storytelling in a movie.
meanings.sent3: The students' project on cinematography was both educational and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His passion for cinematography led him to pursue a career in filmmaking.
meanings.sent5: The cinematography of the documentary brought the real-life events to the audience in a powerful way.
